trans-unit.source: Specifies trace data options to be written to the trace output.
This enumeration is used by trace listeners to determine which options, or elements, should be included in the trace output.
Trace listeners store the trace options in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A> property.

The following example shows the use of the `traceOutputOptions` attribute to specify the trace output options for a <xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener> that is enabled using a configuration file.
For details about adding trace listeners to the application configuration file, see [\<listeners\>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-trace.md).
The <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceOptions> enumeration is not used by the following classes and methods:
The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener> class, because it can cause a large volume of data to be written to the log.

The `Write` and `WriteLine` methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ConsoleTraceListener>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener> classes.

The <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.WriteLine%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener> class when they are not overridden in a derived class.
Write the call stack, which is represented by the return value of the <xref href="System.Environment.StackTrace"></xref> property.
Write the logical operation stack, which is represented by the return value of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.CorrelationManager.LogicalOperationStack"></xref> property.
Write the process identity, which is represented by the return value of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.Id"></xref> property.
Write the thread identity, which is represented by the return value of the <xref href="System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId"></xref> property for the current thread.
Write the timestamp, which is represented by the return value of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.GetTimestamp"></xref> method.
